page.description: Executes the actions for a Responsive Layout rule, ignoring whether or not the rule evaluates to a true result.

argument.name: ruleName
argument.description: The name of the rule that has the actions to execute.

page.discussion: The *[js:{dialog.object}.fireLayoutRule]* method executes the actions for a Responsive Layout rule, ignoring whether or not the rule evaluates to a true result. This method does not set the rule to the 'active' rule.
